▾
Dictionary (French)

sans preposition—

without prep (often used)

Je bois toujours mon thé sans sucre. — I always drink tea without sugar.
Le pilote a posé l'avion sans difficulté. — The pilot landed the plane without difficulty.

but for prep

Sans le retard de l'avion, j'aurais manqué mon vol. — But for the plane's delay, I would have missed my flight.
less common:
free of prep
·
sans prep

Examples:

sans faille—

watertight adj

sans problème adv —

flawlessly adv

sans surprise—

predictable adj
See more examples • See alternative translations

indiscriminate adj

unwittingly adv

seamless adj

·
wholehearted support n

destitute adj
